update t_policy
`name` = #{name,jdbcType=CHAR},
num = #{num,jdbcType=CHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=CHAR},
cards = #{cards,jdbcType=CHAR},
categories = #{categories,jdbcType=CHAR},
educations = #{educations,jdbcType=CHAR},
titles = #{titles,jdbcType=CHAR},

funds = #{funds,jdbcType=INTEGER},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
dr = #{dr,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where policy_id = #{policyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update t_policy set `name` = #{name,jdbcType=CHAR}, num = #{num,jdbcType=CHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=CHAR}, cards = #{cards,jdbcType=CHAR}, categories = #{categories,jdbcType=CHAR}, educations = #{educations,jdbcType=CHAR}, titles = #{titles,jdbcType=CHAR}, qualities = #{qualities,jdbcType=CHAR}, honour_ids = #{honourIds,jdbcType=CHAR}, apply = #{apply,jdbcType=TINYINT}, color = #{color,jdbcType=CHAR}, rate = #{rate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, unit = #{unit,jdbcType=TINYINT}, times = #{times,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bank = #{bank,jdbcType=TINYINT}, annex = #{annex,jdbcType=TINYINT}, annex_info = #{annexInfo,jdbcType=CHAR}, apply_form = #{applyForm,jdbcType=CHAR}, funds = #{funds,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, dr = #{dr,jdbcType=TINYINT} where policy_id = #{policyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT tb.num,tb.`name` FROM `t_bank` tb LEFT JOIN t_policy_apply pa ON tb.pa_id = pa.pa_id LEFT JOIN t_talent t ON pa.talent_id = t.talent_id WHERE open_id = #{openId,jdbcType=CHAR} ORDER BY tb.bank_id DESC
